title: Stars Shine at the Bafta Film Awards
summary: The Bafta Film Awards were held in London at the Royal Festival Hall, where many famous actors and actresses came to celebrate movies. Stars like Wunmi Mosaku, Paul Mescal, and Teyana Taylor walked on the red carpet in beautiful dresses. Some women wore ruffled or shiny dresses in colors like blue and gold, while most men wore tuxedos. Even Paddington Bear showed up in his coat and hat! The event honored the best films and actors, with winners like Jessie Buckley and Robert Aramayo. The Prince and Princess of Wales also attended, smiling for the cameras. It was a fun night for everyone who loves movies.
